meanings.sent1: The teacher will preassign the homework for next week.
meanings.sent2: I always preassign tasks to my team members to ensure efficiency.
meanings.sent3: It was funny when I accidentally preassigned the wrong project to my colleague.
meanings.sent4: She seemed to preassign roles in the group like a director casting a play.
meanings.sent5: The software allows you to preassign seats for the event with just a few clicks.

meanings.definition: To designate or allocate in advance
meanings.sent1: The company will preassign parking spots for the employees.
meanings.sent2: Please preassign the rooms for the conference attendees.
meanings.sent3: I preassigned the dessert to my brother, but he ate it before dinner!
meanings.sent4: The team captain preassigned positions on the field strategically.
meanings.sent5: You can preassign your preferred time slot for the meeting using the online scheduler.
